mapper.select: select e.exchange as exchange, e.exchange_status as exchange_status, e.date as exchange_date, e.team_total as team_total, t.name as team_name, m.name as member_name, a.name as activity_name from exchange_detail e, team t, member m, activity a where e.team_id = t.id and (e.activity_id = a.id or e.activity_id is null);
mapper.insert: insert into exchange_detail(member_id, activity_id, team_id, exchange, exchange_status, date) values(#{member.id}, #{activity.id}, #{team.id}, #{value}, #{type}, #{date});
